company: INBIFO Institut fur biologische Forschung GmbH
subject: Re.lnvoice Project P3216.your fax of20July 1995
letter_body: Dear Mr.Jakins: We agree to your proposal to deduct 1,400.00 from your invoice # 115812 of 14 June 1995, due to inadequate slide quality in 40% of the larynx slides. Since we cannot use these slides for evaluation purposes, we would like to point out that the actual damage incurred is many times higher than your discount. If there is to be possible future collaboration we will have to find ways to ensure reliable quality.
